creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a bedroom with a bed in foreground; pair of lamps with frilly shades, radio and telephone on a long dresser below a window with Venetian blinds
portfolio: From Human Arts and Technology series
signed: on back on applied paper  in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: [Bedroom with window, radio, telephone and pair of lamps]
